intro: Helicia calocoma, commonly known as the golden helicia, is a tropical evergreen tree native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Theaceae and is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves and showy yellow flowers. Helicia calocoma plays an important ecological role in its native habitats by supporting local biodiversity.
